speaker: PRINCE
text: Before God, I am exceeding weary.

speaker: POINS
text: Is ’t come to that? I had thought weariness durst

speaker: POINS
text: not have attached one of so high blood.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Faith, it does me, though it discolors the complexion

speaker: PRINCE
text: of my greatness to acknowledge it. Doth it

speaker: PRINCE
text: not show vilely in me to desire small beer?

speaker: POINS
text: Why, a prince should not be so loosely studied

speaker: POINS
text: as to remember so weak a composition.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Belike then my appetite was not princely got,

speaker: PRINCE
text: for, by my troth, I do now remember the poor

speaker: PRINCE
text: creature small beer. But indeed these humble considerations

speaker: PRINCE
text: make me out of love with my greatness.

speaker: PRINCE
text: What a disgrace is it to me to remember thy name,

speaker: PRINCE
text: or to know thy face tomorrow, or to take note how

speaker: PRINCE
text: many pair of silk stockings thou hast—with these,

speaker: PRINCE
text: and those that were thy peach-colored ones—or to

speaker: PRINCE
text: bear the inventory of thy shirts, as, one for superfluity

speaker: PRINCE
text: and another for use. But that the tennis-court

speaker: PRINCE
text: keeper knows better than I, for it is a low ebb of

speaker: PRINCE
text: linen with thee when thou keepest not racket there,

speaker: PRINCE
text: as thou hast not done a great while, because the rest

speaker: PRINCE
text: of the low countries have made a shift to eat up thy

speaker: PRINCE
text: holland; and God knows whether those that bawl

speaker: PRINCE
text: out the ruins of thy linen shall inherit His kingdom;

speaker: PRINCE
text: but the midwives say the children are not in the

speaker: PRINCE
text: fault, whereupon the world increases and kindreds

speaker: PRINCE
text: are mightily strengthened.

speaker: POINS
text: How ill it follows, after you have labored so

speaker: POINS
text: hard, you should talk so idly! Tell me, how many

speaker: POINS
text: good young princes would do so, their fathers being

speaker: POINS
text: so sick as yours at this time is?

speaker: PRINCE
text: Shall I tell thee one thing, Poins?

speaker: POINS
text: Yes, faith, and let it be an excellent good thing.

speaker: PRINCE
text: It shall serve among wits of no higher breeding

speaker: PRINCE
text: than thine.

speaker: POINS
text: Go to. I stand the push of your one thing that

speaker: POINS
text: you will tell.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Marry, I tell thee it is not meet that I should be

speaker: PRINCE
text: sad, now my father is sick—albeit I could tell to

speaker: PRINCE
text: thee, as to one it pleases me, for fault of a better, to

speaker: PRINCE
text: call my friend, I could be sad, and sad indeed too.

speaker: POINS
text: Very hardly, upon such a subject.

speaker: PRINCE
text: By this hand, thou thinkest me as far in the

speaker: PRINCE
text: devil’s book as thou and Falstaff for obduracy and

speaker: PRINCE
text: persistency. Let the end try the man. But I tell thee,

speaker: PRINCE
text: my heart bleeds inwardly that my father is so sick;

speaker: PRINCE
text: and keeping such vile company as thou art hath in

speaker: PRINCE
text: reason taken from me all ostentation of sorrow.

speaker: POINS
text: The reason?

speaker: PRINCE
text: What wouldst thou think of me if I should

speaker: PRINCE
text: weep?

speaker: POINS
text: I would think thee a most princely hypocrite.

speaker: PRINCE
text: It would be every man’s thought, and thou art

speaker: PRINCE
text: a blessed fellow to think as every man thinks. Never

speaker: PRINCE
text: a man’s thought in the world keeps the roadway

speaker: PRINCE
text: better than thine. Every man would think me an

speaker: PRINCE
text: hypocrite indeed. And what accites your most worshipful

speaker: PRINCE
text: thought to think so?

speaker: POINS
text: Why, because you have been so lewd and so

speaker: POINS
text: much engraffed to Falstaff.

speaker: PRINCE
text: And to thee.

speaker: POINS
text: By this light, I am well spoke on. I can hear it

speaker: POINS
text: with mine own ears. The worst that they can say of

speaker: POINS
text: me is that I am a second brother, and that I am a

speaker: POINS
text: proper fellow of my hands; and those two things, I

speaker: POINS
text: confess, I cannot help. By the Mass, here comes

speaker: POINS
text: Bardolph.

speaker: PRINCE
text: And the boy that I gave Falstaff. He had him

speaker: PRINCE
text: from me Christian, and look if the fat villain have

speaker: PRINCE
text: not transformed him ape.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: God save your Grace.

speaker: PRINCE
text: And yours, most noble Bardolph.

speaker: POINS
text: Come, you virtuous ass, you bashful

speaker: POINS
text: fool, must you be blushing? Wherefore blush

speaker: POINS
text: you now? What a maidenly man-at-arms are you

speaker: POINS
text: become! Is ’t such a matter to get a pottle-pot’s

speaker: POINS
text: maidenhead?

speaker: PAGE
text: He calls me e’en now, my lord, through a red

speaker: PAGE
text: lattice, and I could discern no part of his face from

speaker: PAGE
text: the window. At last I spied his eyes, and methought

speaker: PAGE
text: he had made two holes in the ale-wife’s new

speaker: PAGE
text: petticoat and so peeped through.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Has not the boy profited?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Away, you whoreson upright rabbit,

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: away!

speaker: PAGE
text: Away, you rascally Althea’s dream, away!

speaker: PRINCE
text: Instruct us, boy. What dream, boy?

speaker: PAGE
text: Marry, my lord, Althea dreamt she was delivered

speaker: PAGE
text: of a firebrand, and therefore I call him her dream.

speaker: PRINCE
text: A crown’s worth of good interpretation. There

speaker: PRINCE
text: ’tis, boy.

speaker: POINS
text: O, that this good blossom could be kept from

speaker: POINS
text: cankers! Well, there is sixpence to preserve thee.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: An you do not make him be hanged among

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: you, the gallows shall have wrong.

speaker: PRINCE
text: And how doth thy master, Bardolph?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Well, my good lord. He heard of your

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Grace’s coming to town. There’s a letter for you.

speaker: POINS
text: Delivered with good respect. And how doth the

speaker: POINS
text: Martlemas your master?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: In bodily health, sir.

speaker: POINS
text: Marry, the immortal part needs a physician, but

speaker: POINS
text: that moves not him. Though that be sick, it dies not.

speaker: PRINCE
text: I do allow this wen to be as familiar with me as

speaker: PRINCE
text: my dog, and he holds his place, for look you how he

speaker: PRINCE
text: writes.

speaker: POINS
text:
John
                 
                Falstaff
                ,
                 
                knight
                .

speaker: POINS
text: Every man must know that as oft as he has occasion

speaker: POINS
text: to name himself, even like those that are kin to the

speaker: POINS
text: King, for they never prick their finger but they say

speaker: POINS
text: “There’s some of the King’s blood spilt.” “How

speaker: POINS
text: comes that?” says he that takes upon him not to

speaker: POINS
text: conceive. The answer is as ready as a borrower’s

speaker: POINS
text: cap: “I am the King’s poor cousin, sir.”

speaker: PRINCE
text: Nay, they will be kin to us, or they will fetch it

speaker: PRINCE
text:
from Japheth. But to the letter: 
                Reads
                .
                 
              
                Sir
                 
                John
                
                Falstaff
                ,
                 
                knight
                ,
                 
                to
                 
                the
                 
                son
                 
                of
                 
                the
                 
                King
                 
                nearest
                 
                his
                
                father
                ,
                 
                Harry
                 
                Prince
                 
                of
                 
                Wales
                ,
                 
                greeting
                .

speaker: POINS
text: Why, this is a certificate.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Peace!

speaker: PRINCE
text:
Reads
                .
               
                I
                 
                will
                 
                imitate
                 
                the
                 
                honorable
                 
                Romans
                 
                in
                
                brevity
                .

speaker: POINS
text: He sure means brevity in breath, short-winded.

speaker: PRINCE
text:
I
                 
                commend
                 
                me
                 
                to
                 
                thee
                ,
                 
                I
                 
                commend
                 
                thee
                ,
                
                and
                 
                I
                 
                leave
                 
                thee
                .
                 
                Be
                 
                not
                 
                too
                 
                familiar
                 
                with
                 
                Poins
                ,
                 
                for
                 
                he
                
                misuses
                 
                thy
                 
                favors
                 
                so
                 
                much
                 
                that
                 
                he
                 
                swears
                 
                thou
                 
                art
                 
                to
                
                marry
                 
                his
                 
                sister
                 
                Nell
                .
                 
                Repent
                 
                at
                 
                idle
                 
                times
                 
                as
                 
                thou
                
                mayst
                ,
                 
                and
                 
                so
                 
                farewell
                .
                
                Thine
                 
                by
                 
                yea
                 
                and
                 
                no
                ,
                 
                which
                 
                is
                 
                as
                 
                much
                 
                as
                
                to
                 
                say
                ,
                 
                as
                 
                thou
                 
                usest
                 
                him
                ,
                
                Jack
                 
                Falstaff
                 
                with
                 
                my
                 
                familiars
                ,
                
                John
                 
                with
                 
                my
                 
                brothers
                 
                and
                 
                sisters
                ,
                 
                and
                
                Sir
                 
                John
                 
                with
                 
                all
                 
                Europe
                .

speaker: POINS
text: My lord, I’ll steep this letter in sack and make

speaker: POINS
text: him eat it.

speaker: PRINCE
text: That’s to make him eat twenty of his words.

speaker: PRINCE
text: But do you use me thus, Ned? Must I marry your

speaker: PRINCE
text: sister?

speaker: POINS
text: God send the wench no worse fortune! But I

speaker: POINS
text: never said so.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Well, thus we play the fools with the time, and

speaker: PRINCE
text: the spirits of the wise sit in the clouds and mock us.

speaker: PRINCE
text:
To
                 
                Bardolph
                .
               Is your master here in London?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Yea, my lord.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Where sups he? Doth the old boar feed in the

speaker: PRINCE
text: old frank?

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: At the old place, my lord, in Eastcheap.

speaker: PRINCE
text: What company?

speaker: PAGE
text: Ephesians, my lord, of the old church.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Sup any women with him?

speaker: PAGE
text: None, my lord, but old Mistress Quickly and

speaker: PAGE
text: Mistress Doll Tearsheet.

speaker: PRINCE
text: What pagan may that be?

speaker: PAGE
text: A proper gentlewoman, sir, and a kinswoman of

speaker: PAGE
text: my master’s.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Even such kin as the parish heifers are to the

speaker: PRINCE
text: town bull.—Shall we steal upon them, Ned, at

speaker: PRINCE
text: supper?

speaker: POINS
text: I am your shadow, my lord. I’ll follow you.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Sirrah—you, boy—and Bardolph, no word to

speaker: PRINCE
text: your master that I am yet come to town. There’s for

speaker: PRINCE
text: your silence.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: I have no tongue, sir.

speaker: PAGE
text: And for mine, sir, I will govern it.

speaker: PRINCE
text: Fare you well. Go.

speaker: PRINCE
text: This Doll Tearsheet should be some road.

speaker: POINS
text: I warrant you, as common as the way between

speaker: POINS
text: Saint Albans and London.

speaker: PRINCE
text: How might we see Falstaff bestow himself

speaker: PRINCE
text: tonight in his true colors, and not ourselves be

speaker: PRINCE
text: seen?

speaker: POINS
text: Put on two leathern jerkins and aprons, and

speaker: POINS
text: wait upon him at his table as drawers.

speaker: PRINCE
text: From a god to a bull: a heavy descension. It

speaker: PRINCE
text: was Jove’s case. From a prince to a ’prentice: a low

speaker: PRINCE
text: transformation that shall be mine, for in everything

speaker: PRINCE
text: the purpose must weigh with the folly. Follow me,

speaker: PRINCE
text: Ned.
